author: Jeff “Beachbum” Berry
description: Characterful and well-aged rums with a blend of citrus and all-important pimento dram. You may swap rums but there's no substitute for the pimento dram.
name: Ancient Mariner
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
